content: It's great to hear that Hitarth Parikh had the opportunity to explain the Helios product to Saina Nehwal and that she found it interesting. As a professional badminton player, she likely understands the importance of having access to advanced training technologies that can help athletes enhance their performance. Helios, with its focus on improving courtcraft, footwork, reflexes, and agility, could be a valuable tool for badminton players and other athletes looking to improve their skills. It's exciting to see innovative sports tech products like Helios being developed to support athletes in their training and help them reach their full potential.
